Class Games

java.lang.Object
Games
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
Blackjack, Roulette, Slots
public abstract class Games extends Object implements Game
Abstract class that represents a game. All subclasses are required to manage a list of players. Implements the Game interface
